text: [Music]
we friends are back with a new lesson in

communication or communicate verbally

say something all right
or you tell someone something so when

okay well this is the past form of say
said so she said that she loved him a

say to someone like in my second example
he said to me again please remember

so you say something or you say

told me now this is an object pronoun
that means
that she told her or she told him or

here a lot of people get confused and

you always use said I cannot say she

she said do you love me all right I hope
this is clear to you coming to tell he

instructions you use tell and to ask

something you always use set so now
let's take a look at how say and tell is

well you remember in the previous

now my second example we have a made a
direct

remember when you talk about a question

I can't say she told where he lived or
she said where he lived because she

coming to tell he told me that he would

tell someone something so he told me and
not he told to me so he told me that he

something and remember if you are
talking about a question in the reported

always use asked ok friends so now we're
going to see how we use tell when you
make orders advices all with certain
phrases whenever you say
we always use them ok well a few

told him to leave
you do not say she said him to leave
because there's this kind of an order so
she told him well remember she told
someone something so she told him this
is the object pronoun so she told him to
leave ok in my next example tell them to
come on time again we cannot say say

so you say tell them to come on time
tell someone something tell them ok now
there are certain phrases we always use

these are certain phrases where you
